name: Battle Brawlers
detailed_description:
Battler Brawlers is a pace-faced, globally, uniformly served RTS. It breaks boundaries of regions and countries. You can challenge global players anywhere and anytime. Players contest in a symmetric map to place pawns to fight against waves of cruel creatures which threat your war god. Watch out, death of war god means failure of the battle. One battle takes about 10 minutes averagely.

Features
* Provide 1v1 and 2v2 multiplayer PVP arena with real-time chat function
* 5 races, 100+ different arms, 10+ destinctive heroes, 30+ magic spells.
* Auto-match opponents, Ladder tournament, various achievements, reconnecting disconnection, players' profiles, and statistics of game data.
* Global universal server, contest with worldwide ace players.

Gameplay
Instead of building towers, players will place arms which can fight by themselves. Attention, you are not able to move the placed pawns. So you have to think and make strategy before setting up your formation. In each round, your pawns will fight against a new wave of enemy creatures.
Your arms will move, fight and use skills automatically! After defeating enemy, they will return to original positions and restore initial state. You will get gold after each round. Spend gold to set new creatures or upgrade creatures. Be prepared any time! Each round attck of enemy will be fiercer than previous round!
Please defense your war god at all costs. Your troops will form the first defence. If enemy arms defeat your troops, they will directly attack your war god. Players have to kill enemy war god to win the battle before own war god is defeated.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windowsXP SP3/win7/win8/win10
  • Processor: Intel 酷睿双核2.0Ghz或AMD同等性能芯片
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT220, 9500GT, HD4650或同等性能显卡
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650或以上性能显卡
